channel.title: Serverfile, Runserver and Compiler - need help badly
channel.description:
i can't get 2 of them to work, they both close in a 1/4 of a second - and no matter what source i switch to they still close in a 1/4 of a second. but with my keen eyesight :eek: i can make out their words before they close Runserver.batch says something like java is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file
my serverfile.batch says something like tskill is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. press any key to continue...
and my compiler says this Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Starting CheezScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594
i don't know what to do i'm using pimpscape and my serverfile and runserver close suddenly, please help

item.title: Serverfile, Runserver and Compiler - need help badly
item.dc:creator: @waterslicer waterslicer
item.description:
@waterslicer wrote:

and just where is it lol[br][size=1]Posted at: October 05, 2006, 09:27:36 PM[/size][hr]now i changed my runserver,batch, so when i run it it comes up with this

‘nothing’

then client.java opens up, so when runserver.batch works what’s supposed to come up?
by the way, the edit stuff inside my runserver is this

@echo off
title Pimpscape Server
Client.java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
[br][size=1]Posted at: October 05, 2006, 09:27:36 PM[/size][hr]
bump

Read full topic
